PylonGUIIncludes.h File Reference

Master include for Pylon GUI. More...

#include <pylon/Platform.h>
#include <pylon/PylonLinkage.h>
#include <pylon/PylonGUI.h>

Detailed Description

Master include for Pylon GUI.

If you intend to use the GUI classes and functions you must include this file explicitly. This file will not be included automatically when you include pylon/PylonIncludes.h.
